title: Hälsosam Vikt Kalkylator
description: Beräkna your ideal healthy weight range
metaDescription: Gratis healthy weight calculator - Discover your ideal weight range using multiple scientific formulas. Includes Robinson, Miller, Devine, and Hamwi formulas.

form.title: Ange your information
form.currentWeightHelp: Optional: enter your current weight to see personalized recommendations

info.title: Om Hälsosam Vikt
info.description: Hälsosam weight is baserat på the WHO recommended BMI range (18.5-25). This calculator uses din längd to determine your healthy weight range and compares multiple scientific formulas to calculate your ideal weight.
info.formulasDescription: Four recognized scientific formulas are included (Robinson 1983, Miller 1983, Devine 1974, Hamwi 1964). The Hamwi formula is also adjusted for small body frame (-10%) and large body frame (+10%).
info.limitations: These formulas are general estimates for adults aged 18 or older. They do not account for individual body composition, muscle mass, or specific health conditions. Consult a healthcare professional for personalized guidance.
